Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 10 Apr 2019Age doesn't matter. Knowledge and being prepared financially and mentally matters. You can be that at age 18 or 58. Doesn't mean it's too early or too late to invest.0 comments0
